mcq.statement: Choose the correct sentence: It isn't far from the university, is it?, It isn't far from the university, isn't it?, It isn't far from university, has it?, It isn't far from the university, doesn't it?

options.a: It isn't far from the university, doesn't it?
options.b: It isn't far from the university, isn't it?
options.c: It isn't far from the university, is it?
